item.title: Will your insurance policy cover short term rental?
item.description:
Will your insurance policy cover short term rental?

Having a comprehensive insurance policy on your holiday home is a no brainer - but have you checked with your insurer about renting your property as a short term holiday rental? Many property owners automatically assume that because they have insurance on their holiday house that they are covered by their insurer for holiday rentals.
